boardgame.name: DC Comics Dice Masters: World_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Finest
boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;DC Comics Dice Masters: World's Finest is a collectible dice-building tabletop game designed by Quarriors! creators Michael Elliott and Eric M. Lang._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In this game, each player fields one of the superhero teams, with each hero _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; Batman, Superman, Power Girl, and more _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; being represented by custom-tooled dice; each team must be composed of 15 dice, and a player can _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;purchase_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; dice only from his team. Each hero also has one or more character reference cards, which show the special abilities for the characters based on the die rolls. Different versions of these cards are available in booster packs, allowing for more customization of your team. Players use these dice to collect energy, recruit new heroes, and battle head-to-head. In addition, each player brings two basic action cards to the game, which are placed in the center of the table; both players can purchase these cards. A player wins once the opposing player has been reduced to zero life._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;DC Comics Dice Masters: World's Finest will introduce new game mechanics: the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Allies_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; keyword as well as the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Iron Will_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Vengeance_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; abilities. Over 30 heroes and villains make up the new card and dice for this expansion._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
